mapper.sql: SELECT dpi.erp_pr_no, dpi.item_seq, dpi.item_nm, di.e4u_item_cd as item_cd, dpi.erp_item_cd, dpi.cls_cd, dpi.size_nm, dpi.model_nm, dpi.mk_comp_nm, dpi.unit_cd, dpi.qty, dpi.plan_unit_prc, dpi.dlv_loc, To_date(dpi.dlv_req_ymd, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlv_req_ymd FROM agt_dum_pritem dpi LEFT JOIN agt_dum_item di ON( di.erp_item_cd = dpi.erp_item_cd )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agt_dum_pritem ( erp_pr_no, item_seq, item_nm, erp_item_cd, cls_cd, size_nm, model_nm, unit_cd, qty, plan_unit_prc, mk_comp_nm, dlv_loc, dlv_req_ymd ) VALUES ( #{erpPrNo}, #{itemSeq}, #{itemNm}, #{itemCd}, #{clsCd}, #{sizeNm}, #{modelNm}, #{unitCd}, #{qty}, #{planUnitPrc}, #{mkCompNm}, #{dlvLoc}, To_char( #{dlvReqYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD') )
